channel.title: Linting on Minko Gechev's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Linting on Minko Gechev's blog

item.title: Fast, extensible, configurable, and beautiful linter for Go
item.description: About a year ago I decided to polish my Go skills. Although the language is pretty small compared to most others that I use on a daily basis, it still has some useful syntax constructs that I didn’t use enough. What a better way to brush up your skills in a programming language other than building tools with it…for analyzing programs written in it? You can find revive on GitHub at github.
